tool_description: An API showing the latest Tech News around the world.
name: Tech News
title: Tech News

api_list.name: Get Individual News Source News
api_list.description: Get news about Tech from a specific news resource.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://tech-news2.p.rapidapi.com/news/Gizmodo"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tech-news2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://tech-news2.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tech-news2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Tech News
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back all news about Tech from all over the world.
